descriptor.name: Pure Shilajit Resin Form With Gold Dust 20 g
descriptor.short_desc: UPAKARMA Ayurveda | Premium Shilajit Gold Dust Resin 20g | 100% Ayurvedic | Pure and Natural Shilajeet | Helps to Boost Immunity, Energy, Strength, Stamina, and Overall Health
descriptor.long_desc:
PURE SHILAJIT - Pure Shilajit Gold Dust by Upakarma Ayurveda is a powerful health and immunity booster. The high concentration of minerals, Fulvic, and Humic acids in Shilajit provides innumerable benefits. It is a natural dietary supplement with Gold Vark, having a positive impact on physical and mental well-being.
 MORE POWER AND STRENGTH - The Main benefit of Shilajit is helps to improve energy levels which significantly improves strength and stamina. Fulvic acid and Humic acid present in Shilajit help attain more power for better athletic performance.
 GOLD BENEFITS - Swarna Vang is an ancient ayurvedic medicine that has numerous health benefits such as helping better cell regeneration and cell recovery which leads to faster healing. In addition, Shilajit Gold Dust contains anti-ageing properties that help boost collagen production leads to better skin elasticity, thus promotes healthy, youthful, and glowing skin.
 NO ADDED CHEMICALS - Premium Quality Shilajit Gold Dust 20 grams by Upakarma Ayurveda is free from any chemicals, binders, or filler and is only made from pure and natural ingredients.
 HOW TO USE FOR BEST RESULTS - Take a pea-sized amount of Upakarma Ayurveda Pure Shilajit Resin with Gold Dust and dissolve it in 100 - 200 ml of lukewarm milk or water. Stir it thoroughly and drink. For best results, it is advisable to consume twice a day.
 NATURAL AND LAB-TESTED FOR QUALITY - We donâ€™t believe in compromising on the quality; moreover all our products are manufactured under GMP & ISO certified units.
